CustomField.description: For use in reporting. Adding as a filter with a True value will return Referral records where the DSM's (viewing the report) Employee is listed in the User lookup field
CustomField.inlineHelpText: For use in reporting. Adding as a filter with a True value will return Referral records where the DSM's (viewing the report) Employee is listed in the User lookup field
CustomField.label: Manager Team Received Referral
